alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Union, central Columbia, eastern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 215 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wellborn, or near White Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Live Oak, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Columbia, Winfield, Suwannee Valley, Mcalpin, Wellborn and Five Points. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union
